name: 2 Hours to Spare
description:
Come back from work and spend time in the town
You have until 12am

A game made in a little over 72 hours for Mini Jam 106

Cursor keys/WASD - move
X - jump
C -Accept/Menu

1 - 4 to change window size

NOTE: The pause option does not function as of now

Known issues:

Player can sometimes gain control during cutscenes
Stair collision is incorrect at times
Various spelling errors 
Potential to rarely get stuck during screen transitions
